thread.title: Edgar Agents to Counsel Companies at The SPAC Conference 2018 in New York City

author: cnbc.com
title: Edgar Agents to Counsel Companies at The SPAC Conference 2018 in New York City
text:
NEW YORK, Feb. 12, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Edgar Agents, the full-service SEC filing agency for public companies, private equity firms, and securities law firms, today announced that the company will be presenting their Capital Markets and Corporate Services solutions at The SPAC Conference 2018 on February 15. The event is held at the TKP Conference Center in New York City.
Hosted by DealFlow Events, this annual SPAC Conference creates one of the largest gathering of investors, bankers and management teams interested in SPAC and Alternative IPO opportunities.
Edgar Agents is the only financial printer to offer SPACs a Success/Abort Fee Structure with a guaranteed rate cap. In addition to this filing workflow and 2018 pricing model, other key topics of discussion with Edgar Agents include:
Changes to the structure of SPACs Current market dynamics and 2018 forecast Understanding the evolution of the market Legal and accounting requirements Navigating proxy statement/S-4 reporting requirements Transitioning from business combination filings through closing The practicalities of getting a deal done
This event offers a rich conversation forum about recent deal activity and why SPACs and other alternative IPO techniques have been gaining in popularity. Edgar Agents’ solutions are especially tailored for SPACs, IPOs and their investment bankers and securities law firms:
S-1 and secondary offering transactions Cost-effective EDGAR and XBRL programs Virtual Data Rooms More
To keep up-to-date on Edgar Agents’ continued growth, please follow the company in LinkedIn HERE.
Please visit Edgar Agents today for more information: www.edgaragents.com
About Edgar Agents, LLC
At Edgar Agents, we manage all of your filing needs. From annual 10-Ks and quarterly 10-Qs to 8-Ks, Registration Statements and Section 16 filings, we will provide you with unparalleled customer service, accurate and prompt turn around, all at an incomparably competitive price.
There are no unexpected bills from us. Edgar Agents prides itself on its transparent billing practices. You will receive an invoice within 24 hours of transmission to the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) that clearly states what you are paying for and why.
